org.apache.taverna.reference

Interface ErrorDocumentDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryErrorDocumentDao

    public interface ErrorDocumentDao
    Data access object handling ErrorDocument instances.
    Author:
    Tom Oinn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean delete(ErrorDocument errorDoc) 
      void deleteErrorDocumentsForWFRun(String workflowRunId)

      Retrieves a named and populated ErrorDocument

    • Method Detail

      • store

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED,
               readOnly=false)
void store(ErrorDocument errorDoc)
                                                                        throws DaoException
        Store a named ErrorDocument to the database.
        Parameters:
        errorDoc - error document to store
        Throws:
        DaoException - if any exception is thrown when connecting to the underlying store or when storing the error document

      • get

        @Transactional(propagation=SUPPORTS,
               readOnly=true)
ErrorDocument get(T2Reference reference)
                                                                              throws DaoException
        Retrieves a named and populated ErrorDocument
        Parameters:
        reference - id of the error document to retrieve
        Returns:
        a previously stored ErrorDocument instance
        Throws:
        DaoException - if any exception is thrown when connecting to the underlying data store or when attempting retrieval of the error document
